thread.title: Man plus machine: Biohackers self-experiment to achieve superhuman bodies - Lethbridge Herald
thread.title_full: Man plus machine: Biohackers self-experiment to achieve superhuman bodies - Lethbridge Herald - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Lethbridge Herald
title: Man plus machine: Biohackers self-experiment to achieve superhuman bodies - Lethbridge Herald
text:
Nik Badminton, who has a near field communication RFID chip implanted between his left thumb and index finger, sits for a photograph at his home in Vancouver, B.C., on Thursday October 8, 2015. Badminton says he lives life as an experiment - and the unconventional accessory was his initiation into a growing and global movement called "biohacking" that's taking root on the West Coast.
 Lethbridge Herald.
